work.Summary: Associate engineer with development, testing verification and validation experience on Car UI display systems. Performed phone projection development of user stories and testing with infotainment system such as Android Auto, CarPlay. Analyzed requirements, created test plans, executed test cases for connectivity epic such as C-connect, F-connect. Good at analyzing DLT logs and analyzing the code refactor areas.

internship.Summary: Learned about tools used for website testing such as Deep Trawl, NVDA, web developer extension, OpenVAS. Learned about the importance and concept of OWASP. Learned React JS and worked for Frontend development professionally.

projects.name: Diabetic Retinopathy
projects.description: Created a GUI using QT designer which will take an image of retina as input, input image will be processed and compared with the images present in the database and then classified as one of DR stage or normal. OpenCV and image processing concepts are used. Survey paper on this project is published in the 2nd International Conference on Topical Transcend in Science, Technology & Management.

Summary: Attended 5 days industry orientation workshop organized by free software movement.

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Created an e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and React with JavaScript. Project has functionality where users can select any item of their choice and store it into a cart or add items to their wishlist. Searching functionality allows users to search any product by name.

Summary: Attended a workshop on full-stack development.
Participated in a state-level basketball tournament.

work.Summary: Involved in various communication activities with clients, handling data for all employees.

internship.Summary: Sourced potential candidates from various online channels, crafted recruiting emails to attract passive candidates, screened incoming resumes and application forms.

projects.name: Efficiency Design of Solar Panels
projects.description: This project aims to design the solar panel cells with higher energy consumption in all types of weathers and also helps in absorbing higher energy.
